title: Rename application from Fresh Dairy Market to DairyDelight

requirements.text: Update the application name from 'Fresh Dairy Market' to 'DairyDelight' in the header logo/branding

quotes: change name to dairydelight from fresh dairy market

acceptanceCriteria: Header component displays 'DairyDelight' as the application name
Logo/branding text is updated throughout the navigation

requirements.text: Update any page titles, meta tags, or document titles from 'Fresh Dairy Market' to 'DairyDelight'

quotes: change name to dairydelight from fresh dairy market

acceptanceCriteria: Any meta tags reference 'DairyDelight' instead of 'Fresh Dairy Market'

requirements.text: Update the hero banner text on the catalog page from 'Fresh Dairy Market' to 'DairyDelight' if present

quotes: change name to dairydelight from fresh dairy market

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays 'DairyDelight' instead of 'Fresh Dairy Market'
All user-facing text reflects the new brand name

constraints: Do not modify backend functionality or data models
Preserve existing farm-inspired visual theme and styling
nonGoals: Changing the visual design or color scheme
Modifying product data or cart functionality
Adding new features beyond the name change
